titles.title: Grape Region Accelerated Production and Efficiency Act of 2011
To exempt drivers used by motor carriers from certain regulations if transporting grapes during a harvest period, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 10/5/2011--Introduced. Grape Region Accelerated Production and Efficiency Act of 2011 - Exempts from federal maximum driving and on-duty time motor carrier regulations any drivers transporting grapes in a state if the transportation is: (1) during a harvest period, and (2) limited to an area within a 175 air mile radius from the location where the grapes are picked or distributed.
